column5: It is cold out there!  We caught 22 perch today, kept 2 that was 8 and 9 inches, took em home got em ready for the fry pan...Was delicious! We played in the snow on our toboggan too, i took a dump face first in the snow too....So we are going back out maybe Tuesday....  Has anyone heard how Port Bolster is doing?  Hope everyone did well, over the weekend.....Good Luck!  Lorissa
i did the same on sat. at the same spot. maybe tomorrow i should go try another spot. seems like all those dinky perch only.
